summary: The Bahamas is a country made up of over 3,000 islands in the Atlantic Ocean, near Cuba and Florida. It was first inhabited by the Arawak and Lucayan people, then explored by Christopher Columbus in 1492. The islands became a British colony in 1718 and gained independence in 1973. Today, the Bahamas has a strong economy based on tourism and finance. Most of its population is descended from African slaves brought there by the British and American Loyalists. Black-Bahamians make up 90% of the population.
title: The Bahamas
